channel.title: HHS Poetry Anthologies 2006
channel.itunes:subtitle: Holliston High School Freshmen Poetry Anthologies
channel.itunes:author: Don Quindley, Paul Whalen
channel.itunes:summary: HHS Student Poetry Anthologies. This poetry anthology project was adapted by Mr. Don Quindley for his grade 9 Freshman English class. Students were required to complile a poetry anthology made up of several original poems, well-known poems various artwork and illustrations. The anthology was later published as a print version and as an online anthology. Starting in 2006, the students selected one of their poems for publication to our school's ever-growing selection of "Pod Class" offerings.

item.title: Introduction
item.itunes:author: Introduction
item.itunes:subtitle: About the Online Anthology Project - Paul Whalen
